text: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا ۖ فَإِن يَشَإِ ٱللَّهُ يَخْتِمْ عَلَىٰ قَلْبِكَ ۗ وَيَمْحُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْبَـٰطِلَ وَيُحِقُّ ٱلْحَقَّ بِكَلِمَـٰتِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

translation.en.sahih: Or do they say, "He has invented about Allah a lie"? But if Allah willed, He could seal over your heart. And Allah eliminates falsehood and establishes the truth by His words. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.
translation.id.indonesian: Bahkan mereka mengatakan: "Dia (Muhammad) telah mengada-adakan dusta terhadap Allah". Maka jika Allah menghendaki niscaya Dia mengunci mati hatimu; dan Allah menghapuskan yang batil dan membenarkan yang hak dengan kalimat-kalimat-Nya (Al Quran). Sesungguhnya Dia Maha Mengetahui segala isi hati.
